text:
So much this. I remember 2009 when didn’t receive our first doses of the pandemic #H1N1 #influenza #vaccine until we were in the midst of a surge in new cases - & kids needed 2 doses for adequate coverage. Similar scenario.
#VaccinesWork #VaccinesSaveLives #TakeYourShot #COVID19 https://t.co/WI0zo5dX9W
